title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.4 - Job and power usage requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.4 - Job and power usage requirements

State Regulations

Applications for allocations of economic development power
shall specifically indicate that the proposed recipient intends to commit to
maintain specified levels of employment and power usage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
370.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
